title: How to Add a Gmail Button to Chrome

steps.title: Search for "Gmail for chrome" in the Google search bar.
steps.content: Search for "Gmail for chrome" in the Google search bar. Click on the Gmail option from the list.

steps.title: Click "add to chrome" in the top right of the "Send from Gmail" option.
steps.content: Click "add to chrome" in the top right of the "Send from Gmail" option.

steps.title: Click "add" in the "confirm new extension" screen.
steps.content: Click "add" in the "confirm new extension" screen. This allows Gmail additional access to your data, it's important to note.

steps.title: Navigate to a site that you like and want to share with friends, and then click the Gmail button in the top right.
steps.content: Navigate to a site that you like and want to share with friends, and then click the Gmail button in the top right.

steps.title: Enter an address of someone you'd like to send the site to.
steps.content: Enter an address of someone you'd like to send the site to. The site appears automatically in the body of the email. Click "Send" to send the site to the person.
